ai.summary: An easy 4.4 km loop through Handsworth Park, suitable for families and casual walkers, featuring park paths, green spaces, and light art installations.
ai.terrain_summary: Predominantly flat with well-maintained paved paths; occasional gravel sections and gentle slopes near park features.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on marked paths and be mindful of other park users, including cyclists and joggers. Check weather forecast and daylight hours before you go, bring water, and wear appropriate footwear. Secure valuables, and supervise children closely in busy areas. In autumn and winter, be prepared for mud and reduced visibility in the evening.
recommended_gear: Smartphone with offline map or local map
ai.best_seasons: Spring and summer are ideal, though the trail is accessible year-round in the UK.
